    • Method Detail

      • locationUpdated

        void locationUpdated(LocationProvider device,
                   Location rawLocation,
                   Location adjustLocation)
        Called by the VirtualGPSDevice to which this listener is registered. This method will be called periodically according to the interval defined when registering the listener to provide updates of the current location.
        Parameters:
        device - the source of the event.
        rawLocation - the raw location to which the event relates, i.e. the new position direction from Location Provider.
        adjustLocation - the adjust location to which the event relates,it may be adjusted to put on the map direction.

      • navigationDone

        void navigationDone()
        Navigation is done.

      • statusChange

        void statusChange(int oldStatus,
                int newStatus)
        Navigation status change happend.
        Parameters:
        oldStatus - old status
        newStatus - new status.

      • reroutingDone

        void reroutingDone(java.lang.String query,
                 MapDirection result)
        rerouting is done.
        Parameters:
        query - message query context(string).
        result - the result object.

      • reroutingProgress

        void reroutingProgress(int bytes,
                     int total)
        rerouing progress progress notification.
        Parameters:
        bytes - the number of bytes has been read.
        total - total bytes to be read.Total will be zero if not available (content-length header not set)
